attributes.action: Suspend Nursing and Midwifery Council registration charges for our medical staff
attributes.additional_details: We're calling for a review of NMC registration fees during this crisis period - either cancelled or at the very least suspended during this period. Every year our medical staff have to pay just to practice - they should not be having to pay for the privilege of saving our lives during the coronavirus crisis. We're essentially sending our underpaid and overworked troops to battle on the frontline of our NHS - let's show them the respect they deserve and cancel their fees.
attributes.background: Our medical staff have to pay at least £120 every year in registration fees. They are still being requested even now during the Covid-19 crisis, when they are our frontline troops. We're asking them to risk their health and lives, with minimal PPE, whilst paying for the privilege of saving ours.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307399

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
